sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './StatsOverview.css'; const StatsOverview = ({ stats = {}, lowAttendanceAlert, refreshMessage, lastUpdated, onRefresh, onExport, attendanceData = [], isLoading }) => { return (

Dashboard Overview

{new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}
{lastUpdated && (
Last updated: {lastUpdated}
)} {refreshMessage && (
{refreshMessage}
)}
{/* Stats Cards */}

Total Students

{stats?.totalStudents || 0}

Today's Attendance

{stats?.todayAttendance || 0}

Weekly Attendance

{stats?.weeklyAttendance || 0}

Attendance Rate

{stats?.attendancePercentage || 0}%

{/* Low Attendance Alert */} {lowAttendanceAlert && (

Low Attendance Alert

{typeof lowAttendanceAlert === 'string' ? lowAttendanceAlert : lowAttendanceAlert?.message || 'Low attendance detected'}

)} {/* Recent Attendance Table */} {attendanceData && attendanceData.length > 0 && (

Recent Attendance

{attendanceData.slice(0, 10).map((record, index) => ( ))}
Student ID Name Department Time Meal Type
{record?.studentId || 'N/A'} {record?.studentName || 'N/A'} {record?.department || 'N/A'} {record?.timestamp ? new Date(record.timestamp).toLocaleTimeString() : 'N/A'} {record?.mealType || 'N/A'}
)}
); }; export default StatsOverview;
